answers.answer: It is possible to have a 10 pound baby without having gestational diabetes
Had gd but baby was very small. 1.88 kg

I had gestational diabetes and ny baby was only 6 lbs 8 oz. I had a section because she was breeched. Everyone is different. And u can have a section even if ur baby is small lol theres lots of reason to have a section. And the recovery was nothin. I had a friend that had a baby same time and me she did vaginal i did section and i healed before she did.

question: So ive heard if u get gestational diabetes during ur pregnancy u can deliver a 9 or 10 pound baby.. is it possible to deliver a nine to ten pound baby even though u dont have gestational diabetes? All my test came out normal but i feel like my baby is gonna come out big.. even my doc told me she seems big.. and i really dont want to have a c section done.. im due in 6 days and im worried that i might get a c section :/
title: Gestational diabetes, big babies??
